title: Camouflage
description: Camouflage explains different types of animal camouflage. Readers learn why and how animals use camouflage throughout their lives. The book shows examples of types of camouflage in interesting, close-up photographs.
highFrequencyWords: blending coloration, blotch, conceal, disguise, disruptive coloration, eyespot, flash coloration, offspring, predators, prey, startle, warning coloration
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
